owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: A common vocabulary for clothing items.
Semantic Clothing Ontology
owl:Ontology.dc:bibliographicCitation: *** H&M, http://www.hm.com/ro/ (provided support for a few of the concepts used in this ontology)

***, Dr. Sabin-Corneliu Buraga, Web Applications Development (Fall 2014), (RO) http://profs.info.uaic.ro/~busaco/teach/courses/wade/index.html, UAIC, FII (this resource provided serveral useful examples from which this ontolgy was modeled after, together with theoretical support).
***, Haine Grasute, http://hainegrasute.blogspot.ro/2013/05/cum-sa-te-imbraci-avantajos-in-functie.html (provided support for modelling the 'body shapes' part of the ontology)
***, ZARA, http://www.zara.com/ro/en/ (provided support for serveral concepts used in this ontology)
owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Daniel Amariei
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: The purpose of this ontology is to create the common conceptual framwork for 'talking' about clothing or related concepts.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Dress size
Body shape has suitable clothing for dressing
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the clothing item(s) that is/are suitable for a particular body shape.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Dressing code has suitable clothing for dressing
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the clothing item(s) that is/are suitable for a particular dressing code.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Event has suitable clothing for dressing
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the clothing item(s) that is/are suitable for a particular event.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Genre has suitable clothing for dressing
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the clothing item(s) that is/are suitable for a particular genre.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has colour
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the color a particular clothing item has.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has size
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the size of a particular clothing item.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has textile composition
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property denotes the materials from which a clothing item is composed of.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has texture
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the texture of the clothing item.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is manufactured by
Is suitable for dressing code
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifis the dressing code for which a particular clothing item and/or class is/are suitable for.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is suitable for dressing for religion
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifis the religion for which a particular clothing item and/or class is/are suitable for.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is suitable to be dressed at event
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the Event for which a particular clothing item and/or class is/are suitable for.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is suitable to be dressed by body shape
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Stipulates for which body shape a particular clothing item and/or class is/are suitable for.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is suitable to be dressed by genre
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the genre(s) for which a clothing item is suitable for. We need to make this general enough since some clothing items can be suitable for both sexes.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is suitable to be dressed in season
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the season for which a particular clothing item and/or class is/are suitable for.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is suitable to be dressed in weather conditions
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifis the weather conditions for which a particular clothing item and/or class is/are suitable for.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Religion has suitable clothing for dressing
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifis the clothing that is suitable for a particular religion.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Season has suitable clothing for dressing
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the clothing item(s) that is/are suitable for a particular season.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Weather has suitable clothing for dressing
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the clothing item(s) that is/are suitable for a particular weather condition.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Clothing
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents a clothing item (e.g. Skirt, Jeans, Shoes, etc.) or a collection of clothing items (e.g. a suit -- which is formed from multiple items.). We need to abstract the posibility that a clothing item can be formed from one or multiple clothing items.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Body shape
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of body shapes a person can have.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Clothing material
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The basic materials from which clothes are made of.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Clothing style
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the clothing style for which a particular clothing item and/or class is/are suitable for.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Funneral clothing
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Clothing that is suitable for a funneral.

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Conservative dress code
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: This individual specifies that a particular clothing item is suitable for the Conservative dressing code.

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Rock dress code
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: This individual specifies that a particular clothing item is suitable for the Rock dressing code.

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Sport dress code
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: This individual specifies that a particular clothing item is suitable for the Sport dressing code.

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Has colour
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the color a particular clothing item has.

owl:NamedIndividual.sioc:note: Pyjama Unisex received as gift from father.
